title: Badass Bakery
description: A badass bakery you'll love to try

products.title: Bahn Mi Sandwich
products.description: Bahn making mi crazy! Crunchy, loaded, and straight-up flavor-packed — Bánh Mì’s the real deal, stacking meats, pickles, and herbs in every no-nonsense bite.

products.title: Sponge Cake
products.description: Light, airy, and unapologetically loaded — this melt-in-your-mouth sponge cake stacks high with juicy strawberries, kiwi, and a wild mix of fresh berries. The ultimate fruity flex.

products.title: Hello Sundae World
products.description: The Hello World Sundae is a fully stacked, developer-approved dessert loaded with vanilla "root" ice cream, hot "Java" fudge, byte-sized brownies, and syntax-sprinkled toppings — the perfect first commit for your sweet tooth.

products.title: Steamed Coconut Layered Cake
products.description: Soft, chewy, and packed with bold coconut flavor — this Steamed Coconut Layered Cake is a legendary treat that’s all about rich, creamy layers. Share it, or keep it all to yourself — your call!

products.title: Vietnamese Iced Coffee
products.description: Bold, smooth, and dangerously sweet — this iced Vietnamese brew hits hard with strong coffee and creamy condensed milk. It'll cool you down, wake you the hell up and make you happy too, all in one sip.

products.title: Sesame Balls
products.description: Crispy on the outside, chewy at the core — these golden sesame balls pack a punch of sweet, gooey goodness in every bite.

products.title: Tri-Color Dessert
products.description: A harmonious trio of layers, where bold flavors and silky textures converge — a tiny, edible universe unfolding in every colorful bite.

products.title: Macarons
products.description: In every delicate macaron, a universe of flavor and wonder is compressed into a fragile, colorful shell, reminding us that even the smallest creations can hold infinite beauty.
